channel.title: [PI]players cant level up summoning![PI] plz help me i need YOUR HELP
channel.description: hello there guys so I download a PI base and has summoning in it but the problem is that the summoning skill doesn't increase in level so like if they make a wolf pouch it increases their xp but the level doesn't increase it just stays 1 and yes it have been tried many times and even though the next level at:Xp amount changes the level stays at one anyone help me? and also i thought you better know that the base is this one: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=493987.0

item.title: [PI]players cant level up summoning![PI] plz help me i need YOUR HELP
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
